attributes.additional_details: Ok April 12th Article 13 was passed, it would moniter everything uploaded to the internet taking away the freedom of the internet.
attributes.background: I would like to have Article 13 revoked as it is an infringement of free speech.

rejection.details:
The issue you raise is the responsibility of the European Union, not the UK Government or Parliament. You could start a new petition about this issue with the European Parliament, which has its own petitions system:

http://www.europarl.europa.eu/atyourservice/en/20150201PVL00037/Petitions

If you want the UK Government and Parliament to repeal the EU Copyright Directive, when the UK leaves the EU, you may wish to sign this petition instead: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/228620
